e711e87d-24a9-4309-af54-b0a98484fed9.description: National Certified Investigator and Inspector Training: Regulatory discipline and compliance professionals participate either in a three-day, hands-on training and certification program in investigation and inspection techniques and procedures or CLEAR's Virtual Online NCIT program. The program takes attendees through every step in the investigative process: from planning the investigation to writing the report. Designed for both experienced and novice investigators.
e711e87d-24a9-4309-af54-b0a98484fed9.name: NCIT Basic

issuer.summary: issued by Council on Licensure, Enforcement and Regulation (CLEAR) NCIT

entity.name: Council on Licensure, Enforcement and Regulation (CLEAR) NCIT

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge participate in either a three-day NCIT Basic program or an online NCIT Program  and pass a cumulative exam. In addition to this badge, anyone who completes the Basic curriculum, passes the course examination, and meets the one-year experience requirement as a regulatory investigator or inspector, may then apply for CLEAR’s NCIT Basic Certification.

60466608-4af1-43f9-b1aa-97e358e22c15.description: This section of the NCIT Specialized Program focuses on - Complaint Scene Analysis teaches how to develop a process of analytical thinking that assists the investigator in obtaining correct investigative information. Written Statement Analysis includes techniques for identifying omissions and potential deception in a written statement. Many boards or agencies obtain a written statement from licensees, complainants and witnesses during or even before an investigation.
60466608-4af1-43f9-b1aa-97e358e22c15.name: NCIT Specialized - Investigative Analysis

issuer.summary: issued by Council on Licensure, Enforcement and Regulation (CLEAR) NCIT

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed advanced certification in individual subject areas including interviewing techniques, investigative analysis and report development. Each module is an eight-hour session designed to promote interaction through use of small groups, role-playing exercises and case studies.

0bd3fed4-8e27-4afb-ad9e-061d7b25f8ab.description: This program consists of information and practical exercises to improve an investigator's written reports. The course approaches report development as an integrated process, used from the beginning to the end of an investigation; one that clarifies the investigative path and improves thoroughness and accuracy. Topics include: Developing report formats. Reporting descriptive observation and activities. Reporting interview information. Obtaining written statements.
0bd3fed4-8e27-4afb-ad9e-061d7b25f8ab.name: NCIT Specialized - Report Development

798db787-f804-462d-906c-5a55bcb1ce5a.description: This section of the NCIT Specialized Program includes: Cognitive Memory Retrieval is an interviewing technique developed by memory researchers from the Behavioral Science Unit of the Los Angeles Police Department and from UCLA's Department of Psychology. Behavioral Analysis involves the analysis of non-verbal and verbal communications to determine if an interview subject is omitting information or, potentially, is being deceptive.

ee1f3e92-9808-43ef-aa46-dd9070d3924a.description: The workshop focuses on sexual misconduct issues that regulators encounter during the course of these investigations.
ee1f3e92-9808-43ef-aa46-dd9070d3924a.name: Investigating Reports of Sexual Misconduct

issuer.summary: issued by Council on Licensure, Enforcement and Regulation (CLEAR) NCIT

entity.name: Council on Licensure, Enforcement and Regulation (CLEAR) NCIT

badge_template_activities.title: Upon completion of this workshop learners will be able to: Understand why cases involving sexual misconduct require special attention. Demonstrate sensitivity to the special needs of an investigation involving sexual misconduct. Identify the resources necessary to assist you during your investigations of alleged sexual misconduct. Recognize the importance of taking care of your own mental and emotional health as you conduct investigations into reports of sexual misconduct.
